Package org.apache.turbine.services

Klasse MethodAnnotatedTurbineBaseService

java.lang.Object
org.apache.turbine.services.BaseInitable
org.apache.turbine.services.BaseService
org.apache.turbine.services.TurbineBaseService
org.apache.turbine.services.MethodAnnotatedTurbineBaseService
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Initable, Service
public abstract class MethodAnnotatedTurbineBaseService extends TurbineBaseService

This class provides a Service implementation that Services used in Turbine are required to extend. This class provides the ability to process field and method annotations TurbineServices in a Turbine service. You could also enable scanning globally by annotating the class (service) with the annotation TurbineServices, then method annotation could be omitted, if the argument class is TurbineServices annotated.

    • init

      public void init() throws InitializationException
      Performs late initialization. If your class relies on early initialization, and the object it expects was not received, you can use late initialization to throw an exception and complain.
      Angegeben von:
      init in Schnittstelle Initable
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      init in Klasse TurbineBaseService
      Löst aus:
      InitializationException - if initialization of this class was not successful.
